description: This file defines the AppRouter class, which provides a minimal route map for a Flutter application using MaterialApp. It specifies a single route '/' that maps to an AppShell widget displaying a welcome message.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides static routing information for the Flutter app, including a routes map with a single route '/' leading to the AppShell widget.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Getter that returns a map of route strings to widget builder functions, defining the app's route configuration.
